Header: PM says development of the country is moving ahead
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe says development of the country has not been stopped in the face of challenges. The Prime Minister said this while attending a function at the Badalkumbura Divisional Secretariat. Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe opened the new two storied building of the Badalkumbura Divisional Secretariat in the Moneragala district. 22 million rupees has been spent on the constructions. A group of people including Ministers Vajira Abeywardena, Ranjith Maddumabandara and Deputy Speaker Ananda Kumarasiri were present on the occasion. Meanwhile, the Prime Minister also opened the new building of the Siyambalaanduwa Divisional Secretariat in Moneragala. 67 million rupees has been spent to construct the building with many modern facilities. The Prime Minister also attended a function to pay compensation to the farmers of the Moneragala district whose cultivations have been destroyed due to drought. A large number of farmers were paid compensation at the function.
